title: Is it really safe to take the Covid Vaccines?
cleaned_text:
I speak from Brazil and this week our Supreme Court just made mandatory to everyone to take the Covid Vaccine once it's available. It means that if you don't take it you'll be in trouble to vote, travel and other things.

At same time there are groups questioning about the such short time these vaccines were developed, (much shorter and very different from other vaccines) and of course, what are politicians intentions with this reinforcement on the population and also questioning about the actual substances inside the vaccine.

Some groups are even talking about the bible and that is written there that it's the first step to mass slavery and control of the population, and the next step will be the microchip in the forehead, this one yet to come in the next 5 years, which will be the ultimate sign of the beast... etc.

Does any of that make any sense? Or it's just another conspiracy theory?

@Leo Gura, what's your take on that?

Guys, what do you think?
